I was in a team consisted of second year students from [ITB](https://fsrd.itb.ac.id/), [ITENAS](https://www.itenas.ac.id/), [IKJ](http://www.fftv.ikj.ac.id/) and [IPB](https://ipb.ac.id/), produced the movie in 2003 and we participated the [Festival Film Independen Indonesia](https://majalah.tempo.co/read/film/88500/napas-segar-di-dunia-sinema) hosted by SCTV.

And involved in the production of this following movie, mainly in property and set construction but also as one of the casts (Si Amrik).
